rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light from the north window. Incorporates wheelchair accessible pathways.
Adjacent to the living room for family meals with an open space design. Features wheelchair accessible dining table layout.
Functional kitchen space with modern fixtures and adequate ventilation. Wheelchair accessible counters included.
Dedicated home office with sound insulation and ergonomic design. Positioned to ensure clear north-south alignment for energy flow.
Primary bedroom with south-facing window ensuring privacy and calm atmosphere. Wheelchair accessible layout.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with safety features such as grab bars and anti-slip tiles.
Long corridor connecting all rooms with wheelchair accessible paths and sufficient turning space.

openings.description: North-facing entrance with ample lighting, ensuring compliance with Vastu and ease of access for wheelchair users.
Multiple windows distributed across rooms to ensure natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu.
Balcony overlooking the north side providing additional light and air circulation.

accessibility_features.description: Ramps at all entrances and critical transitions for wheelchair access.
Counters in kitchen and bathroom designed to be accessible from a seated position.
